official_title: Increasing Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Vaccine Uptake Via General Health Messaging
inclusion_criteria:
* Women who are patients at the clinic
* Age 21+
* Have a working mobile phone with SMS capability
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Male
* <21 years of age
* Do not have a working mobile phone with SMS capability
